text: وَلُوطًا ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗا وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ ٱلَّتِي كَانَت تَّعۡمَلُ ٱلۡخَبَـٰٓئِثَۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمَ سَوۡءٖ فَٰسِقِينَ

translation.en: And to Lot We gave judgement and knowledge, and We saved him from the city that was committing wicked deeds. Indeed, they were a people of evil, defiantly disobedient
translation.id: Dan kepada Luṭ, Kami berikan hikmah dan ilmu, dan Kami selamatkan dia dari (azab yang telah menimpa penduduk) kota yang melakukan perbuatan keji.534) Sungguh, mereka orang-orang yang jahat lagi fasik
